Reviews.Content: booked reservation ac avenida reading hotel trip advisors email blasts close downtown madrid costing arm legs wasnt disappointed selection modern art deco look feel complete hardwood floors minimal furniture sinks low lighting hunter green marble tile bathroom wood sliding doors sporting frosted glass closets light beautiful ive seen hotel food isnt bad cheaper options eat hotel confirm menu front desk offerings change erratically depending time day im due august entire city pretty shuts holiday attendance slim housekeeping staff fantastic job cleaning particular looking id stepped foot bad dont complaints ac bother 1 clock spain 2 fitness center actually bicycles treadmill weight rack 3 charging 12 euros 24hour wifi free lobby bit ridiculous thats ac avenida pleasant stay recommend bare essentials little flavor oh dont speak spanish desperate help jesus front desk godsend
